segments.text: Telco Mobile , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I â€™ d like to activate my voice mail service please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly sir , we currently have a special promotion where we include voice mail services , call waiting and also three way calling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure that sounds great ! Are there any other fees ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . No hidden fees or surcharges , it is a flat monthly rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . I also wanted to know if there is any call forwarding service ? I am usually out of town and would like my calls to be forwarded to a local number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes of course . We can activate all these services in about an hour .
segments.speaker: S1
